alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Howard; Merrick; Sherman (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued April 10 at 4:25AM CDT until April 10 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...Red Flag Warning Today and a Fire Weather Watch Tuesday... ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM NOON TODAY TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING FOR WIND AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 046, 047, 048 AND 063... * AFFECTED AREA...In Nebraska, Fire Weather Zone 046 Sherman, Fire Weather Zone 047 Howard, Fire Weather Zone 048 Merrick and Fire Weather Zone 063 Hamilton. * WINDS...Northwest 15 to 25 mph with gusts of 30 to 35 mph. * TIMING...Red Flag Warning today from noon through 8 PM. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as around 20 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that ignite may spread rapidly and exhibit extreme fire behavior. Use extreme caution if engaging in activities that could result in fire ignition.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will shortly. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.
